headline: Here's Why Ralph Lauren (RL) Fell More Than Broader Market
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Ralph Lauren (RL) stood at $230.98, denoting a -0.53% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Ralph Lauren, Yum! Brands, Tesla: Market Minute
summary: Wealth host Madison Mills takes a look at the top stories on Wall Street in today's Market Minute: Argus Research analysts upgrade Ralph Lauren (RL) to Buy from Hold, citing international demand. Yum! Brands (YUM) — the parent company of KFC, Pizza Hut, and Taco Bell — also received an upgrade from Argus analysts based on strong same-store sales and artificial intelligence (AI) marketing. Tesla (TSLA) is set to release its fourth quarter delivery numbers this Thursday, January 2, 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.
